trans-unit.source: Manage users and roles | Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: Manage users and roles | Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Správa uživatelů a rolí | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: Learn how to manage users and Role Centers in Business Central.

seg-source.mrk: Learn how to manage users and Role Centers in Business Central.

target.mrk: Dozvěďte se více o správě uživatelů a centech rolí v Business Cental.

trans-unit.source: Understanding Users, Profiles, and Role Centers

seg-source.mrk: Understanding Users, Profiles, and Role Centers

target.mrk: Porozumění uživatelům, profilům a centrům rolí

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], users are added by an administrator who also gives users access to the areas of [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] that they need in their work.

seg-source.mrk: In [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], users are added by an administrator who also gives users access to the areas of [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] that they need in their work.

target.mrk: V [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] jsou uživatelé přidáváni administrátorem, který také dává uživatelům přístup k oblastem v [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], které potřebují v jejich práci.

trans-unit.source: Access to functionality is managed through *user groups* and *profiles*.

seg-source.mrk: Access to functionality is managed through *user groups* and *profiles*.

target.mrk: Přístup k funkcím je řízen prostřednictvím *skupin uživatelů* a *profilů*.

trans-unit.source: As an administrator, you can add and remove users as part of your [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] subscription, and you can assign users permissions through user groups.

seg-source.mrk: As an administrator, you can add and remove users as part of your [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] subscription, and you can assign users permissions through user groups.

target.mrk: Jako správce můžete v rámci předplatného [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] přidávat a odebírat uživatele a přiřazovat uživatelská oprávnění prostřednictvím skupin uživatelů.

trans-unit.source: Adding Users

seg-source.mrk: Adding Users

target.mrk: Přidávání uživatelů

trans-unit.source: To add users in [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] online, your company's Office 365 administrator must first create the users in the Office 365 Admin Center.

seg-source.mrk: To add users in [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] online, your company's Office 365 administrator must first create the users in the Office 365 Admin Center.

target.mrk: Chcete-li přidat uživatele do [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] online, musí správce vaší společnosti Office 365 nejprve vytvořit uživatele v Office 365 Admin Center.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Add Users to Office 365 for business](https://aka.ms/CreateOffice365Users).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Add Users to Office 365 for business](https://aka.ms/CreateOffice365Users).

target.mrk: Pro více informací navštivte [Přidejte uživatele k Office 365 pro firmy](https://aka.ms/CreateOffice365Users).

trans-unit.source: Then, the administrator can assign permissions to each user and groups of users.

seg-source.mrk: Then, the administrator can assign permissions to each user and groups of users.

target.mrk: Poté může správce přiřadit oprávnění každému uživateli a skupinám uživatelů.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Managing Users and Permissions](ui-how-users-permissions.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Managing Users and Permissions](ui-how-users-permissions.md).

target.mrk: Pro více informací navštivte [Správa uživatelů a oprávnění](ui-how-users-permissions.md).

trans-unit.source: The most powerful permissions that a user can have is the SUPER permission set.

seg-source.mrk: The most powerful permissions that a user can have is the SUPER permission set.

target.mrk: Nejsilnější oprávnění, které může mít uživatel je sada oprávnění SUPER.

trans-unit.source: Each company must have at least one user with this permission set, but it is a best practice to give each user permissions that match their work needs in [!INCLUDE[prodshort](includes/prodshort.md)] and not more than that.

seg-source.mrk: Each company must have at least one user with this permission set, but it is a best practice to give each user permissions that match their work needs in [!INCLUDE[prodshort](includes/prodshort.md)] and not more than that.

target.mrk: Každá společnost musí mít alespoň jednoho uživatele s touto sadou oprávnění, ale nejlepší postup je udělit každému uživateli oprávnění, která odpovídají jejich pracovním potřebám v [!INCLUDE[prodshort](includes/prodshort.md)], a ne více než to.

trans-unit.source: This helps ensure that users only have access to data that is relevant to their work, for example.

seg-source.mrk: This helps ensure that users only have access to data that is relevant to their work, for example.

target.mrk: To pomáhá zajistit, aby uživatelé měli například přístup pouze k datům, která jsou relevantní pro jejich práci.

trans-unit.source: It's a best practice to make sure that the Office 365 administrator also has the SUPER permission set in [!INCLUDE[prodshort](includes/prodshort.md)] because that makes many administrative tasks easier, including setting up integration with other apps.

seg-source.mrk: It's a best practice to make sure that the Office 365 administrator also has the SUPER permission set in [!INCLUDE[prodshort](includes/prodshort.md)] because that makes many administrative tasks easier, including setting up integration with other apps.

target.mrk: Doporučujeme zajistit, aby měl správce Office 365 také oprávnění SUPER v [!INCLUDE[prodshort](includes/prodshort.md)], protože to usnadňuje mnoho administrativních úkolů, včetně nastavení integrace s jinými aplikacemi.

trans-unit.source: Users of on-premises deployments

seg-source.mrk: Users of on-premises deployments

target.mrk: On-premises uživatelé

trans-unit.source: For on-premises deployments of [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], the administrator can choose between different credential authorization mechanisms for users.

seg-source.mrk: For on-premises deployments of [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], the administrator can choose between different credential authorization mechanisms for users.

target.mrk: V případě on-premises [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] administrátor si může vybrat mezi různými mechanismy autorizace pověření pro uživatele.

trans-unit.source: Then, when you create a user, you provide different information depending on the credential type that you are using in the specific [!INCLUDE[server](includes/server.md)] instance.

seg-source.mrk: Then, when you create a user, you provide different information depending on the credential type that you are using in the specific [!INCLUDE[server](includes/server.md)] instance.

target.mrk: Poté, když vytvoříte uživatele, poskytnete různé informace v závislosti na typu pověření, které používáte v konkrétní [!INCLUDE[server](includes/server.md)] instanci.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Authentication and Credential Types](/dynamics365/business-central/dev-itpro/administration/users-credential-types) in the Administration section of the developer and ITPro content for [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see the [Authentication and Credential Types](/dynamics365/business-central/dev-itpro/administration/users-credential-types) in the Administration section of the developer and ITPro content for [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

target.mrk: Pro více informací navštivte [Typy ověřování a pověření ](/dynamics365/business-central/dev-itpro/administration/users-credential-types)v části Správa Vývojáře a obsahu ITPro pro [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Profiles

seg-source.mrk: Profiles

target.mrk: Profily

trans-unit.source: The people in your company who have access to [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] are all assigned a *profile* that gives them access to a *Role Center*.

seg-source.mrk: The people in your company who have access to [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] are all assigned a *profile* that gives them access to a *Role Center*.

target.mrk: Lidé ve vaší společnosti, kteří mají přístup k [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], mají přiřazený *profil*, který jim umožňuje přístup do *Centra rolí*.

trans-unit.source: Profiles are collections of [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] users who share the same Role Center.

seg-source.mrk: Profiles are collections of [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] users who share the same Role Center.

target.mrk: Profily jsou sbírky [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] uživatelů, kteří sdílejí stejné Centrum rolí.

trans-unit.source: A Role Center is the entry point and home page for [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] that gives you quick access to your most important tasks and displays various insights and key performance indicators (KPIs) about your work.

seg-source.mrk: A Role Center is the entry point and home page for [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] that gives you quick access to your most important tasks and displays various insights and key performance indicators (KPIs) about your work.

target.mrk: Centrum rolí je vstupní bod a domovská stránka v [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], která vám poskytuje rychlý přístup k nejdůležitějším úkolům, zobrazuje různé statistiky a klíčové ukazatele výkonu (KPI) o vaší práci.

trans-unit.source: In the current version of [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] online, you cannot add, edit, or delete profiles.

seg-source.mrk: In the current version of [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] online, you cannot add, edit, or delete profiles.

target.mrk: V aktuální online verzi [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] nemůžete přidávat, upravovat ani mazat profily.

trans-unit.source: Create a profile

seg-source.mrk: Create a profile

target.mrk: Vytváření profilů

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Search for Page or Report](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Search for Page or Report icon") icon, enter **Profile List**, and then choose the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Search for Page or Report](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Search for Page or Report icon") icon, enter **Profile List**, and then choose the related link.

target.mrk: Zvolte ikonu ![Vyhledat stránku nebo sestavu](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Ikona Vyhledat stránku nebo sestavu"), zadejte **Profily** a pak vyberte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: On the **Profile List** page, choose the **New** action to open the **New Profile Card** page.

seg-source.mrk: On the **Profile List** page, choose the **New** action to open the **New Profile Card** page.

target.mrk: Na stránce **Seznam profilů** vyberte akci **Nový**, která otevřete stránku **Nová karta profilu.**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Profile ID** field, enter a name that describes the intended role of the users.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Profile ID** field, enter a name that describes the intended role of the users.

target.mrk: Do pole **ID profilu** zadejte název, které popisuje zamýšlenou roli uživatelů.

trans-unit.source: In the **Description** field, enter a description of the Profile ID, for example, **Order Processor**.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Description** field, enter a description of the Profile ID, for example, **Order Processor**.

target.mrk: Do pole **Popis** zadejte popis ID profilu, například **Zpracovatel objednávek**.

trans-unit.source: Set the **Role Center ID** field to the Role Center that you want to assign to the profile.

seg-source.mrk: Set the **Role Center ID** field to the Role Center that you want to assign to the profile.

target.mrk: Nastavte pole **ID centra rolí** na Centrum rolí, které chcete profilu přiřadit.

trans-unit.source: The procedure for modifying an existing profile is the same, except you select an existing profile on the **Profile List** page instead of choosing the **New** action.

seg-source.mrk: The procedure for modifying an existing profile is the same, except you select an existing profile on the **Profile List** page instead of choosing the **New** action.

target.mrk: Postup úpravy existujícího profilu je stejný, kromě toho, že vyberete existující profil na stránce **Profily** namísto výběru tlačítka **Nový**.

trans-unit.source: Copy a profile

seg-source.mrk: Copy a profile

target.mrk: Kopírování profilů

trans-unit.source: Copying a profile can save you time if you want to use similar settings on a profile and you only want to change a few settings.

seg-source.mrk: Copying a profile can save you time if you want to use similar settings on a profile and you only want to change a few settings.

target.mrk: Kopírování profilu vám může ušetřit čas, pokud chcete v profilu použít podobné nastavení a chcete změnit pouze několik nastavení.

trans-unit.source: Open the profile that you want to copy, and then choose the **Copy Profile** action.

seg-source.mrk: Open the profile that you want to copy, and then choose the **Copy Profile** action.

target.mrk: Otevřete profil, který chcete zkopírovat, a pak vyberte tlačítko **Kopírovat profil**.

trans-unit.source: In **New Profile ID** field, enter a name for the profile that you want to copy.

seg-source.mrk: In **New Profile ID** field, enter a name for the profile that you want to copy.

target.mrk: Do pole **Nové ID profilu** zadejte název profilu, který chcete zkopírovat.

trans-unit.source: Set the **New Profile Scope** field to one of the following:

seg-source.mrk: Set the **New Profile Scope** field to one of the following:

target.mrk: Nastavte pole **Obor nového profilu** na jednu z následujících možností:

trans-unit.source: **System** to make the new profile available to all tenant databases that use the application.

seg-source.mrk: **System** to make the new profile available to all tenant databases that use the application.

target.mrk: **Systém** zpřístupní nový profil všem nájemcům databáze, kteří aplikaci používají.

trans-unit.source: **Tenant** to make the new profile available to just the current tenant database.

seg-source.mrk: **Tenant** to make the new profile available to just the current tenant database.

target.mrk: **Tenant** zpřístupní nový profil pouze aktuální databázi nájemců.

trans-unit.source: Choose the **OK** button when done.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the **OK** button when done.

target.mrk: Po dokončení zvolte tlačítko **OK**.

trans-unit.source: Export and import profiles

seg-source.mrk: Export and import profiles

target.mrk: Export a import profilů

trans-unit.source: You can export and import profiles as XML files to and from the a [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] database.

seg-source.mrk: You can export and import profiles as XML files to and from the a [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] database.

target.mrk: Profily můžete exportovat a importovat jako soubory XML z a do databáze [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Exporting and importing a profile can save you time when configuring the user interface because you reuse an existing profile configuration instead of having to configure a profile from scratch.

seg-source.mrk: Exporting and importing a profile can save you time when configuring the user interface because you reuse an existing profile configuration instead of having to configure a profile from scratch.

target.mrk: Export a import profilu vám může ušetřit čas při konfiguraci uživatelského rozhraní, protože znovu použijete existující konfiguraci profilu místo toho, abyste museli profil konfigurovat od nuly.

trans-unit.source: If you have a profile that is configured in a [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] database and you would like to reuse all or some of the same profile configurations in another database, you can export the profile to an XML file.

seg-source.mrk: If you have a profile that is configured in a [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] database and you would like to reuse all or some of the same profile configurations in another database, you can export the profile to an XML file.

target.mrk: Pokud máte profil nakonfigurovaný v databázi [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] a chcete znovu použít všechny nebo některé stejné konfigurace profilu v jiné databázi, můžete jej exportovat do souboru XML.

trans-unit.source: Then, you can import the profile XML file into the other database.

seg-source.mrk: Then, you can import the profile XML file into the other database.

target.mrk: Poté můžete importovat soubor XML profilu do jiné databáze.

trans-unit.source: To export a profile, you can either choose the **Export Profiles** action from the **Profile List** or **Profile Card** page or you can search for and open the **Export Profiles** page.

seg-source.mrk: To export a profile, you can either choose the **Export Profiles** action from the **Profile List** or **Profile Card** page or you can search for and open the **Export Profiles** page.

target.mrk: Chcete-li exportovat profil, můžete buď vybrat akci **Exportovat profilů** na stránce **seznam Profilů** nebo na **kartě profilu** nebo můžete vyhledat a otevřít stránku **Export profilů**.

trans-unit.source: Save the XML file to a location on your computer or network.

seg-source.mrk: Save the XML file to a location on your computer or network.

target.mrk: Uložte soubor XML v počítači nebo síti.

trans-unit.source: To import a profile, you can either choose the **Import Profile** action from the **Profile List** page, or you can search for and open the **Import Profiles** page.

seg-source.mrk: To import a profile, you can either choose the **Import Profile** action from the **Profile List** page, or you can search for and open the **Import Profiles** page.

target.mrk: Chcete-li importovat profil, můžete buď vybrat tlačítko **Importovat profil** na stránce **seznam Profilů**, nebo můžete vyhledat a otevřít stránku **Importovat profil**.

trans-unit.source: You cannot import a profile that already exists in the database, even though the XML file is named differently or has different content.

seg-source.mrk: You cannot import a profile that already exists in the database, even though the XML file is named differently or has different content.

target.mrk: Nelze importovat profil, který již v databázi existuje, přestože je soubor XML pojmenován odlišně nebo má jiný obsah.

trans-unit.source: You must delete the existing profile before you can import the new profile.

seg-source.mrk: You must delete the existing profile before you can import the new profile.

target.mrk: Před importem nového profilu musíte odstranit existující profil.

trans-unit.source: Configuration and Personalization

seg-source.mrk: Configuration and Personalization

target.mrk: Konfigurace a přizpůsobení

trans-unit.source: Users personalize the user interface of their personal version by customizing the user interface under their own user logon.

seg-source.mrk: Users personalize the user interface of their personal version by customizing the user interface under their own user logon.

target.mrk: Uživatelé si přizpůsobují své uživatelské rozhraní pomocí svého uživatelského nastavení pod svým vlastním loginem.

trans-unit.source: This personalization can be deleted by the administrator.

seg-source.mrk: This personalization can be deleted by the administrator.

target.mrk: Tyto přizpůsobení může správce odstranit.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Personalizing Your Workspace](ui-personalization-user.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Personalizing Your Workspace](ui-personalization-user.md).

target.mrk: Pro více informací navštivte [Přizpůsobení pracovního prostředí](ui-personalization-user.md).

trans-unit.source: See Also

seg-source.mrk: See Also

target.mrk: Viz také

target.mrk: Správa Personalizace jako správce

seg-source.mrk: Personalizing Your Workspace

target.mrk: Přizpůsobení pracovního prostředí
